Posts.EditableText: I've set up a simple calendar here to list events, conferences, competition deadlines etc - anything that I find interesting, really: http://blog.textadventures.co.uk/calendar/ Let me know if you think there's anything I should add!
Posts.HTML:
I've set up a simple calendar here to list events, conferences, competition deadlines etc - anything that I find interesting, really:

http://blog.textadventures.co.uk/calendar/

Let me know if you think there's anything I should add!
